abstract: Poor Blackstone Group. Everything seems to be going wrong for it these days. Last week Blackstone’s buy-out of PHH and its mortgage service business collapsed amidst reports of acrimony between Blackstone and its bankers JPMorgan Chase and Lehman Brothers. The deal cost Blackstone some reputational capital and perhaps a financing relationship or two.
lead_paragraph: Poor Blackstone Group. Everything seems to be going wrong for it these days. Last week Blackstone’s buy-out of PHH and its mortgage service business collapsed amidst reports of acrimony between Blackstone and its bankers JPMorgan Chase and Lehman Brothers. The deal cost Blackstone some reputational capital and perhaps a financing relationship or two.

headline.main: A Closer Look at the Alliance Data Deal

abstract: Stephen Schwarzman has been forced to eat a rare slice of humble pie on Wall Street. Schwarzman, chief executive of the Blackstone Group, went hat in hand to JPMorgan Chase and Lehman Brothers in an effort to mend fences after the banks pulled the plug on his $1.8 billion deal to acquire PHH, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Schwarzman has been forced to eat a rare slice of humble pie on Wall Street. Schwarzman, chief executive of the Blackstone Group, went hat in hand to JPMorgan Chase and Lehman Brothers in an effort to mend fences after the banks pulled the plug on his $1.8 billion deal to acquire PHH, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Schwarzman Said to Offer Olive Branch to Banks

abstract: JPMorgan Chase plans to add at least 700 staff to its Asia-Pacific headquarters in Hong Kong over the next three years and lease up to 11 floors in a new office block to accommodate the growth, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase plans to add at least 700 staff to its Asia-Pacific headquarters in Hong Kong over the next three years and lease up to 11 floors in a new office block to accommodate the growth, Reuters reported.
